sub_title: Value Communications Director at Excerpta Medica BV - Adelphi Group
summary: A PhD in health economics graduated from Fudan University, Shanghai, China, and a PhD in pharmacoepidemiology and pharmacoeconomics graduated from University of Groningen/University Medical Center Groningen, the Netherlands. Demonstrates interdisciplinary skills and research experiences in health insurance policy, health financing, medication purchasing and pricing, medical statistics, pharmacoepidemiology and pharmacoeconmics. Possesses practical experiences in coordinating and managing projects, including writing research proposals, organizing field surveys and other cooperation affairs.

authors.headline: Value Communications Director at Excerpta Medica BV - Adelphi Group

profile_positions.description:
• Focusing on publications and value communications that integrate medical and Health Economics and Outcomes Research (HEOR) data and insights.
• Working closely with clients to develop and execute comprehensive value communication strategies for pharmaceutical and medical device products.
• Supporting international pharmaceutical companies in the development and execution of HEOR publication plans.
• Experience in diabetes, rare diseases, allergic disease, HEOR studies (cost-effectiveness analysis, decision modelling, real-world study using medical claims, electronic health records, etc).
profile_positions.title: Value Communications Director

profile_positions.description: Joint project with Fudan University. Project: Development of new methodologies to include actual drugs use in pharmacoeconomic evaluation.
profile_positions.title: Junior Researcher

profile_positions.description:
-	Main investigator and coordinator of research projects in health insurance policy, medication use, health financing and HTA
-	Guiding master students' studies 
-	Coordinating research affairs and project management including writing proposal, organizing field survey and coordinating cooperation between different organizations
profile_positions.title: Postdoctoral Researcher

profile_positions.description: A combined master-doctor program in department of health economic. Thesis: Analysis on effects of Health Financing in China’s urban areas under the background of Universal Health Coverage
profile_positions.title: PHD Candidate

profile_positions.description: Guidance counselor of 85 undergraduate students of Class 2006 within the School of Public Health. The work is mainly about helping undergraduate students assess their skills and interests, in addition to helping them develop academic and career goals
